DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of 12 weeks treatment with Ferrous (II) Glycine Sulphate Complex in comparison to Polyferose capsules in Chinese subjects with manifest Iron Deficiency Anemia.
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind, Double-dummy, Parallel, Active-controlled, Randomized Trial to Evaluate Efficacy & Safety in Anemia Subjects
DOC.criteria: An iron deficiency anemia patient with Serum Ferritin < 12 ng/mL, serum Hbvalues >60 and < 120 g/L in males, < 110 g/L in females With any Malabsorption Syndrome With a history of Thalassemia or Sickle Cell Anemia With untreated concurrent Vitamin B12 or Folate deficiency at Baseline
